channel.title: Deathsoul Development
channel.description:
[center]Im not posting a tread all about what i want to add and need people because i feel that if you've done it on your own or had alittle help with it its more you learn so heres what iv add and what im going to add
What im working on now
Im making a new minigame called deathwars. Its a pvp type game that has two teams of 3-5 players that kill each other untill one team reachs 25 kills. after thats reached the game will send all players back to lobby area
I added a grandexchange base... need to fix interface and make it more user freindly
Im also working on a way to convert the queen black dragon into a pi server
what im going to add in the next weeks
Domination tower Random Events like runescape I have to sof interface just need to code the wheel spinning and random items in boxs Clue scroll with 3-4 stages before the chest is found making a lunar spells work instead of just 3-4 adding more spells to magic make a member and f2p area (all Armors are f2p) remove skilling area and make it more world map adding effects to all items loyalty award system like runescape but get points every 96hours auras that when activated their effects work Full working soul wars (online have lobby area and tele into game working) castle wars Full Warriors guild not just armor
Please dont flame this is my development for my server i already have all my skill at 90-100% full working with interface and all
[/center]

item.title: Deathsoul Development
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

EvilscapeV3:

lmfao your making “deathwars” I do believe I made it. I did give you most credits since it was your idea.

In the code its self its credited to u i just made some tweaks to it also iv completed this list. ill post pictures later this week

item.title: Deathsoul Development
item.dc:creator: @DeathsoulOwner DeathsoulOwner
item.description:
@DeathsoulOwner wrote:

Team_Rocket:

This is such a good Server Development thread. Can I pay you for me to work for you?

Haha your so funny… I was just posting what i have developed its call development… well im developing my server. Im do stuff that other people haven’t ok so i make a crap thread im at least trying to make a server vs leeching a server and then just putting online like half the rsps are

Im making a new minigame called deathwars. Its a pvp type game that has two teams of 3-5 players that kill each other untill one team reachs 25 kills. after thats reached the game will send all players back to lobby area
